description: This course provides students with the basic training in mechatronics skills. Students taking this course will learn the functions of some frequently used mechatronics components and their applications.

syllabus.zh:
一、機電整合實務技術重點介紹
二、自動化設備電路結構與組成元件
三、自動化設備電路元件與各項工具介紹：各式開關及三用電錶等
四、電路元件功能說明與實作
實作1：保險絲、有段式按鈕與選擇性開關、指示燈串與並聯迴路。
(量測串聯時各燈電壓值)
實作2：選擇性開關組成邏輯電路(樓梯間燈迴路)
實作3：馬達起動停止電路(選擇開關，電流錶，指示燈)
實作4：馬達起動停止電路(繼電器，接鈕開關)
(自保電路，啟動顯示，馬達過電流保護並接過電流指示燈)
實作5：雙計時器控制兩顆燈交替閃爍
感測元件功能說明與實作
實作6：光電、近接、磁簧開關接法
實作7：PLC I/O接法及程式輸寫
syllabus.en:
1.Introduction of Mechatronics
2.Some basic Mechatronics components
3.The circuits formed by Mechatronics components
4.Practices
practice 1: simple serial and parallel circuits.
practice 2: building a simple on-off control circuit
practice 3: building a simple on-off control circuit for Motor
practice 4: building a simple on-off control circuit for Motor with timers
practice 5: building a simple blinking control circuit with timers
5.Sonsors and their applications.
6.PLC and ladder diagrams
7.Practices on PLC appliations.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能用機電元件製作基本控制迴路
